TopicTitle: Sector Seven Space Laboratories visits Jool

Articles.Content: After many test launches, modifications, failures and upsets we have now had the joy of viewing the fascinating Planet of Jool! Soon we will be making a landing this is just a screenshot for now. It has been fun getting here!

Wherever I can for this first landing, I will drop straight down because of the lack of fuel on this trip. It seems I had just enough fuel to land and I had to save the mission until next time I visit that one. I found the gravity there fluctuates badly, I thought it was a bad load up of KSP or my computer was acting up but I think that is what KSP that designed it that way for more challenges and fun. I'll post it when I do land if it is possible to land there not sure.
